Bash(venv/Scripts/python -c "
from google import genai
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv

load_dotenv\(\)
client = genai.Client\(api_key=os.getenv\(''GOOGLE_GENAI_API_KEY''\)\)

# List models
for model in client.models.list\(\):
    if ''generate'' in str\(model.supported_actions\).lower\(\) or ''image'' in model.name.lower\(\):
        print\(f''{model.name}: {model.supported_actions}''\)
")

Bash(node -e "const { createClient } = require\(''@supabase/supabase-js''\); const supabase = createClient\(''https://zmzmjzaahxletjokfjdh.supabase.co'', ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6Inptem1qemFhaHhsZXRqb2tmamRoIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc2OTMwNjM0MiwiZXhwIjoyMDg0ODgyMzQyfQ.6bRY4U_EjdZuWvHMMHBGeeB1FZqEDHxDE9-yx08pko0''\); async function main\(\) { const { data, error } = await supabase.from\(''ai_generations''\).select\(''id, title, status, style, created_at''\).order\(''created_at'', { ascending: false }\); if \(error\) { console.error\(''Error:'', error\); return; } console.log\(''All generations:''\); data.forEach\(g => console.log\(JSON.stringify\(g\)\)\); console.log\(''Total:'', data.length\); } main\(\);")

Bash(node -e "const { createClient } = require\(''@supabase/supabase-js''\); const supabase = createClient\(''https://zmzmjzaahxletjokfjdh.supabase.co'', ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6Inptem1qemFhaHhsZXRqb2tmamRoIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc2OTMwNjM0MiwiZXhwIjoyMDg0ODgyMzQyfQ.6bRY4U_EjdZuWvHMMHBGeeB1FZqEDHxDE9-yx08pko0''\); async function main\(\) { const ids = [''c1c4bc063ea2'',''ed4b99a61ba6'',''d235e3ec8eee'',''77981dc32d4c'',''984d744187f9'',''bb0174fb9b55'',''793af12800fd'']; const { error: fjErr } = await supabase.from\(''ai_film_jobs''\).delete\(\).in\(''generation_id'', ids\); if \(fjErr\) console.error\(''Film jobs delete error:'', fjErr\); const { error, count } = await supabase.from\(''ai_generations''\).delete\(\).in\(''id'', ids\); if \(error\) { console.error\(''Error:'', error\); return; } console.log\(''Deleted all 7 old generations successfully''\); } main\(\);")

Bash(node -e "const { createClient } = require\(''@supabase/supabase-js''\); const supabase = createClient\(''https://zmzmjzaahxletjokfjdh.supabase.co'', ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6Inptem1qemFhaHhsZXRqb2tmamRoIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc2OTMwNjM0MiwiZXhwIjoyMDg0ODgyMzQyfQ.6bRY4U_EjdZuWvHMMHBGeeB1FZqEDHxDE9-yx08pko0''\); async function main\(\) { const { data } = await supabase.from\(''ai_generations''\).select\(''id''\); console.log\(''Remaining generations:'', data?.length || 0\); } main\(\);")

Bash(node -e "const { createClient } = require\(''@supabase/supabase-js''\); const supabase = createClient\(''https://zmzmjzaahxletjokfjdh.supabase.co'', ''eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6Inptem1qemFhaHhsZXRqb2tmamRoIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc2OTMwNjM0MiwiZXhwIjoyMDg0ODgyMzQyfQ.6bRY4U_EjdZuWvHMMHBGeeB1FZqEDHxDE9-yx08pko0''\); async function main\(\) { const { data, error } = await supabase.from\(''episodes''\).select\(''id, number, name, status, story_id, is_free, created_at''\).order\(''created_at'', { ascending: false }\); if \(error\) { console.error\(error\); return; } data.forEach\(e => console.log\(JSON.stringify\(e\)\)\); console.log\(''Total:'', data.length\); } main\(\);")
